elements.title: News(Top News : The Yoon Suk Yeol administration agrees with the ruling party to pay at least six million won in COVID-19 relief to small businesses and self-employed people.) - 2022.05.11 PM5
News(Top News : President Yoon Suk Yeol pledges to rebuild the nation based on a liberal democracy and the market economy as he takes office as the 20th president.) - 2022.05.10 PM5
News(Top News : On his final day in office, President Moon jae-in wishes that the incoming government will inherit and advance the achievements of previous governments.) - 2022.05.09 PM5
News(Top News : Two former presidential candidates - the DP's Lee Jae-myung and the PPP's Ahn Cheol-soo - enter the parliamentary by-elections set for June 1.) - 2022.05.06 PM5

News(Top News : North Korea fires a ballistic missile from the Sunan area in Pyongyang in its 14th provocation this year. South Korea condemns the launch as a blatant violation of UN Security Council resolutions.) - 2022.05.04 PM5

News(Top News : President Moon Jae-in promulgates two bills designed to reduce the prosecution's investigative power after the ruling party-led parliament completes the passage of the bills.) - 2022.05.03 PM5
News(Top News : The outdoor mask-wearing requirement is finally lifted.) - 2022.05.02 PM5
